item.title: Poster Collection
item.author: Chocovanilazuki@outlook.com (Edison Zhou)
item.description: Use color to express what’s in mind and convey ideas that can shock the heart. Simple and meaningful

item.title: 2024 Photo Collection
item.author: Chocovanilazuki@outlook.com (Edison Zhou)
item.description: A selection of light and shadow captured in 2024, depicting those touches that exist in memory.

item.title: Video & Music Collection
item.author: Chocovanilazuki@outlook.com (Edison Zhou)
item.description: With hearing and seeing, I want to convey the feelings in my heart, and hope to awaken the initial love of people.

item.title: 2023 Photo Collection
item.author: Chocovanilazuki@outlook.com (Edison Zhou)
item.description: Picked up the camera when I was young, still do not want to put down

item.title: Modeling Collections
item.author: Chocovanilazuki@outlook.com (Edison Zhou)
item.description: Build what I think in my mind and find fulfillment in another fantasy world
